overview: Every night this band played was a major event and spiritual experience for those who witnessed it. What made their performances of July 27 & 28, 1965 even more important was the first and possibly only public performances of Ascension (which they had recorded exactly one month earlier with seven additional musicians) and A Love Supreme which they'd recorded eight months earlier and had become an instant and influential hit in the jazz world. NTSC all region, 52 minutes.
title: John Coltrane: Live in France 1965
